name: Tanya
title: Edenian Renegade
subtitle: An agile assassin wielding sand magic and treacherous tactics
lore: Once a loyal Edenian, Tanya's ambition led her down a path of betrayal and self-service. A cunning fighter and sorceress, she utilizes sand magic and incredible agility, manipulating the battlefield with illusions and swift strikes. Her spear and teleportation abilities allow her to close distances instantly, eliminating targets before they can react.

passive.name: Stance Switch
passive.description: Tanya's basic attacks deal [100%] magic damage when attacking from range and [100%] physical damage when attacking in melee. Attacks against targets marked by Sand Blast (Q), Desert Shield (W), or Spear Throw (E) deal [300%] damage instead.

Q.name: Sand Blast
Q.description: Tanya shoots a blast of sand in the target direction, dealing [50/150/280/320/400 + 80% AP] magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for [5s].

W.name: Desert Shield
W.description: Tanya places a protective shield on herself for [4s], granting [8%] damage reduction and [50%] bonus Movement Speed. If Tanya has at least 250 Ability Power, the damage reduction is increased to [20%]. Enemies who deal damage to Tanya while Desert Shield is active are marked for [5s].

E.name: Spear Throw / Sand Teleport
E.description: Tanya throws her spear in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, it deals [40/70/100/130/160 + 50% AD + 50% AP] mixed damage, marks them for [5s], and slows them by [50%] for [1.5s]. If the spear hits, Tanya can reactivate this ability within [4s] to teleport to the target.

R.name: Sand Slide
R.description: Tanya slides a long distance in the targeted direction, gaining CC immunity during the slide. Activating this ability cleanses Tanya of any existing CC effects. Holds up to 2 charges.

1.name: Sand Recovery
1.description: Sand Blast (Q) refunds [20 Mana] for each enemy champion hit.

1.name: Quickened Spear
1.description: Spear Throw (E) cooldown is reduced by 1s.

1.name: Resourceful Shield
1.description: Desert Shield (W) restores 5% missing mana when activated.

5.name: Burning Mark
5.description: Enemies marked by Sand Blast (Q) take an additional [5% + 1% per 100 AP] magic damage over the duration.

5.name: Teleport Shock
5.description: Teleporting with Sand Teleport (E) deals [30/50/70/90/110 + 30% AP] magic damage in a small area upon arrival.

5.name: Adaptive Shielding
5.description: Desert Shield (W) grants bonus Armor or Magic Resistance based on the type of damage Tanya has recently taken.

10.name: Dust Devil
10.description: Sand Slide (R) leaves a trail of sand for 3s that slows enemies inside by 30%.

10.name: Untouchable
10.description: Using Sand Slide (R) grants Tanya a [100/200/300 + 40% AP] shield for 2s after the slide ends.

15.name: Marked for Death
15.description: Sand Blast (Q) mark now also reduces the target's Magic Resistance by 10%.

15.name: Resetting Teleport
15.description: Getting a kill or assist within 3s of teleporting with Sand Teleport (E) resets its cooldown.

15.name: Improved Desert Shield
15.description: Desert Shield (W) duration increased by 1s and the AP threshold for bonus damage reduction is lowered to 200 AP.

20.name: Relentless Slide
20.description: Sand Slide (R) gains a third charge.

20.name: Explosive Blast
20.description: Sand Blast (Q) explodes on impact, dealing 50% splash damage and applying the mark to nearby enemies.

20.name: Dual Damage Mastery
20.description: Passive (Stance Switch) now grants [10%] Magic Penetration on ranged attacks and [10%] Armor Penetration on melee attacks.

20.name: Spear Impalement
20.description: Spear Throw (E) now stuns the target for 0.75s instead of slowing if hit at close range.
